body.p: In developing IFRS 10, the Board did not reconsider all the requirements that are included in the IFRS. The scope in paragraph 4 and the accounting requirements for consolidated financial statements in paragraphs 19–25 and B86–B99 were carried forward from IAS 27 or SIC‑12 to IFRS 10 without being reconsidered by the Board because their reconsideration was not part of the Board’s consolidation project.
